text: Aaghosham is a 1998 Indian Malayalam film directed by T. S. Saji and starring Madhu and Manoj K. Jayan in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Madhu as Ghee Varghese Ponnukkaran * Manoj K. Jayan as Rex Issac Ponnukkaran * Kalabhavan Navas as Musthafa * Saikumar as Kurishingal Jacky Thamban * Chandni Shaju as Elsa Thamban *Kanakalatha as Leelamma * Narendra Prasad as Kurishingal Urubees Thamban * Suvarna Mathew as Nancy Rex * Jagathnathan as Lonappan *Shivaji as Thirumeni *K. P. A. C. Azeez as I.G Menon *Madhupal as Titto *Kottayam Nazeer as Sethu *Krishna Kumar as Unnikrishnan *Sadiq as Comm.Joshy George *Vijayakumar as Ravi *Manu Varma as Jayakrishnan *Kumarakam Reghunath as C.I Ravishanker *Games as Adv.Sreenivasan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Aaghosham
